1.Title: Rapid Charge Mode
1.Description: When the 4th hit of Anby's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> hits an enemy, her Energy Generation Rate is increased by 12% for 30s.
1.Lore:
"Charge up for just a minute, and you're set to fight for an hour!" That's the sales pitch for these weapon expansion modules.
And they deliver exactly that.

2.Title: Precision Discharge
2.Description: When <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</color> hits a Stunned enemy, its DMG is increased by 30%. When Anby's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> hits an enemy that is not Stunned, the Daze inflicted is increased by 10%.
2.Lore:
"Electric shocks will knock you out cold."
Looking at the enemy out cold at her feet, she added:
"At least, that's what happens in the movies."

3.Title: Well-Disciplined
3.Lore: Run, slash, move like lightning. She is no amateur when it comes to Hollowsâ€”she's an expert.

4.Title: Conducting Charge
4.Description:
When Anby launches a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or uses her <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, off-field Electric Agents recover 3 Energy.
For every 12% Energy Generation Rate Anby has, recover an additional 2 Energy, up to a maximum of 6.
4.Lore: You won't last long fighting solo. An experienced Hollow Raider knows how to create opportunities for their teammates.

5.Title: Street Experience
5.Lore: Working for the Cunning Hares not only builds your mental toughness but also helps (or rather, forces) you to get in shape.

6.Title: Charging Field
6.Description: When Anby uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, she gains 8 stacks of Charge (max 8 stacks). When she hits an enemy with her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, 1 stack of Charge is consumed, increasing that attack's DMG by 45%.
6.Lore:
Coils of electricity flickered over her fingertips.
Anby raised her head, eyes brimming with determination beyond her years.
Perhaps, one day, she will be the one with total mastery over electricity.

DescriptionByLevel.1: Launch a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> after the 3rd hit of Anby's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> for an extra <color=#2BAD00>32%</color> Daze.
DescriptionByLevel.2: Launch a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> after the 3rd hit of Anby's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> for an extra <color=#2BAD00>37.3%</color> Daze.
DescriptionByLevel.3: Launch a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> after the 3rd hit of Anby's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> for an extra <color=#2BAD00>42.6%</color> Daze.
DescriptionByLevel.4: Launch a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> after the 3rd hit of Anby's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> for an extra <color=#2BAD00>48%</color> Daze.
DescriptionByLevel.5: Launch a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> after the 3rd hit of Anby's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> for an extra <color=#2BAD00>53.3%</color> Daze.
DescriptionByLevel.6: Launch a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> after the 3rd hit of Anby's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> for an extra <color=#2BAD00>58.6%</color> Daze.
DescriptionByLevel.7: Launch a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> after the 3rd hit of Anby's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> for an extra <color=#2BAD00>64%</color> Daze.

MathSkill.Title: Additional Ability: Parallel Connection
MathSkill.Description:
When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Anby's <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> hits an enemy, she gains an extra 7.2 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 5s.

101100001.Title: Basic Attack: Turbo Volt
101100001.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 4 slashes. The first 3 hits deal <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>, the 4th hit deals <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.

101100002.Title: Basic Attack: Thunderbolt
101100002.Description:
After unleashing the 3rd hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, hold down or pause for a short while, and then press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes a downward strike that deals <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

101100003.Title: Special Attack: Fork Lightning
101100003.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Unleashes an upward slash that deals <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
This attack launches faster when used after the 3rd hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

101100004.Title: EX Special Attack: Lightning Bolt
101100004.Description:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Unleashes a powerful upward slash that deals massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
This attack launches faster when used after the 3rd hit of her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

101100005.Title: Dodge: Slide
101100005.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

101100006.Title: Dash Attack: Taser Blast
101100006.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Slashes all nearby enemies, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

101100007.Title: Dodge Counter: Thunderclap
101100007.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

101100008.Title: Chain Attack: Electro Engine
101100008.Description:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful upwards slash at enemies in a small area, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

101100009.Title: Ultimate: Overdrive Engine
101100009.Description:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleashes a powerful upward slash at enemies in a small area followed by several downward strikes, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

101100011.Title: Quick Assist: Thunderfall
101100011.Description:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

101100012.Title: Defensive Assist: Flash
101100012.Description:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

101100013.Title: Assist Follow-Up: Lightning Whirl
101100013.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Perform a spinning slash against enemies in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
